vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
1. Persian , [6th/5th c.BC], etc.
2. as Substantive, (.] (entry γῆ); Persis, Persia , now Farsistan , [Refs 5th c.BC]
3. (entry γυνή); a Persian woman , [5th/4th c.BC]
4. (entry χλαῖνα); a Persian cloak , [5th/4th c.BC]
(Middle Liddel)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.12
§ Persis, "female Persian"
Persis, (Proper name), Rom. 16:12*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
彼息氏 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "一位波斯婦女"
在羅馬的一位基督徒婦女(羅 16:12)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
彼息氏 这个阴性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "一位波斯妇女"
在罗马的一位基督徒妇女(罗 16:12)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Bẹt-si-đơ ; Pẹc-si, một phụ nữ cơ đốc ở Rô-ma.
